alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 8:42PM MDT until July 03 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 942 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Rousseau, or 15 miles south of Pierre, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cedar Creek Rec Area, Degrey Rec Area and Joe Creek Rec Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
